name: Ganesh
address: 54 Đường số 6, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: In this restaurant, you can enjoy a variety of Indian curry with naan. The price is a little high, but you can have a decent dinner.

name: Nha hang Lang man Oc
address: 17 Nguyễn Bá Lân, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This restaurant has two main menus. Korean steamed clams and grilled clams are good to eat with soju. Shells are all very fresh.

name: Quan Ut Ut Xuan Thuy
address: 47 Xuân Thủy, P, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000, Vietnam
information: This restaurant sells American BBQ. Pork ribs and pulled fork are very attractive, and you can enjoy your meal in a party-like atmosphere. It's not cheap, but it's good to go on a special day!!

name: Kimgane kimbap
address: 57 Cao Triều Phát, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 756620, Vietnam
information: This restaurant mainly sells Koreans' favorite Korean food. The menu is very diverse, and the price is reasonable. It is highly recommended for those who want to try various Korean foods. Lastly, the best thing about this restaurant is that it is open 24 hours a day.

name: Quan Bui Garden
address: 55A Ngô Quang Huy, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000, Vietnam
information: This restaurant is a universal Vietnamese restaurant. I would like to recommend it to tourists or foreigners because the scent of spices is less strong than ordinary Vietnamese dishes. The food is also neat and delicious. In the afternoon, the vintage and colorful interior is very harmonious with the sunlight coming through the window.

name: Kashew Cheese Deli
address: 14 Đ. Trần Ngọc Diện, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000, Vietnam
information: This restaurant sells various sandwiches. You can visit in the morning, but I recommend you to sit around a pond at an outdoor table at lunchtime and enjoy the atmosphere. The ingredients are very fresh, and the color of the dish is very beautiful for taking pictures. The taste is also perfect, but the food is expensive.

name: Pho Trang
address: 420 Phạm Thái Bường, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000, Vietnam
information: This place is a Vietnamese pho restaurant. It's good to have a simple meal in the morning, and there are many different kinds of pho. All the menus are delicious and the price is cheap. The food is light overall, so you can eat it easily in the morning. I recommend beef rib pho, the signature menu of this restaurant.

name: Banh Mi 362
address: 55 Nguyễn Đức Cảnh, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000, Vietnam
information: This restaurant is a Vietnamese Banh Mi store. Not only do you have a variety of Banh Mi, but you can also add the ingredients you want according to your preference. Because the food comes out quickly, you can have a simple meal when you're busy and it's also easy to pack.

name: Boomerang Bistro Saigon
address: 107 Tôn Dật Tiên, Tân Phú, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 72908, Vietnam
information: This restaurant is a European-style restaurant located next to the lake. From salad to pasta to steak, the menu is diverse and the taste is amazing, but the price is horrible. I recommend you to relax and enjoy brunch and enjoy the lake on weekends rather than on a week day.

name: Cheesecake Ngon Cake Shop
address: 14e Đ. Quốc Hương, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This store specializes in selling cheesecake. All kinds of cakes are cheesecakes, and they have a rich cheese flavor. Also, if you order a cake, you can get beautiful plated cake on the plate. I recommend enjoying it with coffee after taking lunch rather than in the evening. One thing to note is that most cakes are out of stock after 7 p.m.

name: Østerberg Ice Cream
address: 94 Xuân Thủy, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This store is a handmade ice cream store. There are so many different kinds of ice cream, and each one has its own charm. When ordering ice cream, you can choose between a cone and a cup. Also, if you order an ice cream cake in advance for a special day, you can get it delivered within a short distance

name: Cafe Mongdang
address: 94 Xuân Thủy, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This store is a handmade ice cream store. There are so many different kinds of ice cream, and each one has its own charm. When ordering ice cream, you can choose between a cone and a cup. Also, if you order an ice cream cake in advance for a special day, you can get it delivered within a short distance

name: Ruby Soho
address: S52-1 Sky Garden, 2 Đ. Phạm Văn Nghị, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This is a small pub in town, but a draft beer is great. The atmosphere is generally unique and quiet. This store also sell many other kinds of alcohol, so please try it if you have a chance. If you want to drink and talk quietly with your friends after work, it is also good to use the space separated by a partition on the second floor.

name: Speakeasy
address: s35 -1 Le Van Thiem, Huong Vuong 2, Phu My Hung, Tân Phong, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
information: This bar has nothing special about it, but you can enjoy pocketball with other guests at the bar. If you live in Phu My Hung, make new friends here!
